c74object.name: bessel
c74object.description: Calculate Bessel functions, based on parameterization of said functions. An X input will cause a corresponding Y output out the outlet.

method.name: float
method.description: A float input will output the corresponding Y value(s) along the X axis of the transfer function. This output can be a list, depending on the type of Bessel function defined.

entry.name: Inlet 1 [anything]
entry.description: The first inlet of bdist accepts a number of types of messages. Refer to the list above.

entry.name: Outlet 1 [list or float]
entry.description:
This output is variable, and can be one of the following:
- Y output from corresponding X input
- A list of chosen values from the distribution designated in the left inlet
- A float that represents a chosen value from either a bang in the left inlet, or a when the object receives the message [distlist 1]
